unnormalised: Organic farming is the future, yaar! My dadi in Kerala always did it. No chemicals, just gomutra and natural compost. Yield might be a little less than conventional, but so much healthier. Remember the pesticide scare in Punjab back in '97? Plus, supports local economies. Think about getting organic mangoes from Ratnagiri, so much better than the ones sprayed with who knows what! Planning to switch my own little patch near Pune fully organic by 2025, need to research more by 10:00 am, 12/12/2024. Let's make India healthy again, starting 26/01/2026!
normalised: Organic farming is the future, yaar! My dadi in Kerala always did it. No chemicals, just gomutra and natural compost. Yield might be a little less than conventional, but so much healthier. Remember the pesticide scare in Punjab back in ninety seven? Plus, supports local economies. Think about getting organic mangoes from Ratnagiri, so much better than the ones sprayed with who knows what! Planning to switch my own little patch near Pune fully organic by two thousand and twenty five, need to research more by ten AM, twelfth december two thousand and twenty four. Let's make India healthy again, starting twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty six!
